name: The Return To Freddy's 4 Enhanced (Fangame)
description:
The Return To Freddy's 4 Enhanced is a little fangame made in one month with a design highly inspired from FNaF Plus an official Five Nights at Freddy's game made by Phil "Phisnom" Morg !

All credits goes to :

FNaF saga by : Scott Cawthon.

FNaF Plus by : Phisnom.

TRTF saga by : Tyler Ahlstrom.

Text correction by : TristanGames.

Soundtracks by Tcarisland and Patrick de Arteaga. This is a fan-made game based on the Five Nights at Freddy's game series made by Scott Cawthon. System requirements :
  • Windows (7, 8, 10, 11)
  • DirectX : Version 9.
  • Minimum Memory : 1 GB Ram.
  • Resolutions  (1024x576, 1366x768, 1600x900, 1920x1080)
